data.what_is: DailyStory is a turn-key marketing solution that includes software and digital marketing expertise to help SMBs find new customers. And keep them. The DailyStory platform includes just the right amount of features and capabilities to get the most out of your digital marketing investments: email marketing, landing pages, text messaging, multi-channel campaigns, contact management and much more.
data.product_description: DailyStory is a turn-key marketing solution that includes software and digital marketing expertise to help SMBs find new customers. And keep them. The DailyStory platform includes just the right amount of features and capabilities to get the most out of your digital marketing investments: email marketing, landing pages, text messaging, multi-channel campaigns, contact management and much more.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
It efficiently fits into my daily flow and processes. The ability to focus and collaborate is also highly impactful

What do you dislike about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
None that are glaringly obvious, some features have been updated fairly recently that fixed some of the bugs. Occasionally it times out

What problems is DailyStory Marketing Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing marketing campagins, tracking and landing pages

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
review_question_answers.answer: None that are glaringly obvious, some features have been updated fairly recently that fixed some of the bugs. Occasionally it times out

review_question_answers.question: What problems is DailyStory Marketing Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Managing marketing campagins, tracking and landing pages

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
The best thing about DailyStory is that it allows you to create campaigns for different channels like Email, Text Messages, and social media platforms. You can easily create workflows to deliver Emails and Text messages. It also allows you to track different interactions. And it is straightforward and intuitive to use.

What do you dislike about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
Although everything was great with DailyStory, I think the documentation could have been better. Some of the topics are not very clearly explained and explanation looks a bit ambiguous. Apart from this everything was great.

Recommendations to others considering DailyStory Marketing Solutions:
I will suggest you all just go for it. An excellent option for you if you are looking for Digital Marketing campaigns software.

What problems is DailyStory Marketing Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
In our organization we use DailyStory for running Digital Marketing campaigns. The main benefit easy that it's effortless to use, and you quickly get started with this.

initial_reviews.review_title: Leave your company's marketing on professional hands!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
Throughout the years you hire and invest money in getting proper and professional marketing campaigns but these people really care about your worries and turned into real benefits.

What do you dislike about DailyStory Marketing Solutions?
Every company should invest in getting the explanations of their services simple.

What problems is DailyStory Marketing Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Instead of reaching people in your team to gets things done properly, they will do it for you so your team gets more productive.
